document_title: Klinefelter syndrome: Causes, signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Men in puberty and adulthood who notice characteristics related to Klinefelter syndrome should go to medical facilities specializing in andrology or reproductive support for examination.
subsection_title: hoi chung klinefelter.json. When to see a doctor?
subsection_data:
hoi chung klinefelter.json. When to see a doctor?
Men in puberty and adulthood who notice characteristics related to Klinefelter syndrome should go to medical facilities specializing in andrology or reproductive support for examination.
